t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - Amazon.com, Inc., doing business as Amazon (/ˈæməzɒn/ ⓘ, AM-ə-zon; UK also /ˈæməzən/, AM-ə-zən), is an American multinational technology company engaged in e-commerce, cloud computing, online advertising, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.

t: Amazon
s: Thanks for posting your question. A country of manufacture, also known as Country Of Origin (COO) is required on products that are shipped through FBA. The COO of a product is generally the country where the product was wholly produced or manufactured.

t: Amazon’s New Country of Origin Product Details Requirement
s: From January 4, 2021, you will be required to provide Country of Origin (COO) data in order to list products to sell on Amazon. The COO of a product is the country where the product was produced or manufactured. If more than one country is involved in the product’s production or manufacture, ...

t: Why doesn’t Amazon tell me where a product is coming from or where it is made? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 4): Because, within the US, it is required for the product to be labeled with the country of origin, but not necessarily for the retailer to make that known. If the same product is purchased from multiple origins, as can often occur, it is not feasible for the retailer to tell you w...

t: Amazon makes it compulsory for sellers to display country of origin on product listings
s: July 16, 2020 - The All India Online Vendors ... sent by Amazon to its sellers. Some other documents pertaining to the matter have been reviewed by Entrackr, which also reported the development first. ... The move comes days after the government's Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT) invited e-commerce companies for a meeting and asked them to begin displaying the country of origin to identify the products that have been manufactured in China or belong to a China-based brand...

t: Amazon is a company from which country? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 6): Amazon is a multinational technology company based in Seattle, Washington, United States. It was founded in 1994 by Jeff Bezos and has since grown to become one of the largest and most successful online retailers in the world, with operations in various countries around the globe.
